gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 113, Pistons 111
gameRecap.excerpt: Josh Hart (23 points, eight rebounds, six assists) makes the and1 layup with 2.8 seconds remaining in regulation as the Knicks defeat the Pistons, 113-111.  Jalen Brunson led the Knicks with 35 points and 12 assists in the victory.  Cade Cunningham tallied 32 points, five rebounds and eight assists for the Pistons in the losing effort.  The Knicks improve to 35-23 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 8-49.
